item.description: So at the urging of the great B he asked that I open up the event for Social fun as well. I have 20 signed with our other group but could fit a other 20 more. Bickfords is a very popular place with a lot of my cards group members the food is awesome they have a full bar. They have anything from breakfast straight through the weekend to a fried calamari dinner. The is no T transportation but there is a bus just not sure how late it runs. We will have a night 24 hours worth of open cards and games and bridge. The snow shouldn't scare you all away it is supposed to be lit and most of it overnight.
item.how_to_find_us: We have our own private room
item.name: Back to bickfords again joint event with c and c and Beantown bridge
